channel.title: [PI] Re-spawning Rep++
channel.description: when a player logs on for the first time, where would i go to change the location of that, atm its edgeville, i want to change it to something else, and also where would i go to change they location of a player when they die and re-spawn? Rep++

item.title: [PI] Re-spawning Rep++
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

okay it worked, i had to change it in the player.java Thanks vain

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Re-spawning Rep++
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Config class.

Look for:

	public static final int START_LOCATION_X = 2846;
	public static final int START_LOCATION_Y = 3538;

The integers may be different, but the constants should not be.[/quote]
thats what i did tho, i went in config.java, changed the coords to my new home location and yet it still spawns in edgeville, this is what i did in config.java

public static final int START_LOCATION_X = Coords here; // start here
public static final int START_LOCATION_Y = Coords here;

Read full topic

Thats on a delta server probably similar to SI[/quote]

item.title: [PI] Re-spawning Rep++
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

[quote=“s 3 3 m 3, post:2, topic:369159”]Well What Are You Using 317 508 or what? If It Was A 317 you would Go To Player.java And search for the coords that your at when you log in.

Example, mine looks something like this:

    // initial x and y coordinates of the player
    heightLevel = 0;
    // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet
    teleportToX = 3436;
    teleportToY = 3572;

And For the death question open up your client.java, and search for your current death spawning position, should look something alike to the one above…[/quote]
its a PI server, AKA Project insanity, and I’m asking what files would i need to look in to change the coords ect.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Re-spawning Rep++
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

Well What Are You Using 317 508 or what? If It Was A 317 you would Go To Player.java And search for the coords that your at when you log in.

Example, mine looks something like this:

    // initial x and y coordinates of the player
    heightLevel = 0;
    // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet
    teleportToX = 3436;
    teleportToY = 3572;

And For the death question open up your client.java, and search for your current death spawning position, should look something alike to the one above…

Read full topic
